settings.x-axis: Points to the right in the xy ground plane
settings.y-axis: Points down in the xy ground plane
settings.z-axis: Points out of the ground plane (up in 3d space)
settings.origin-location: Top left corner of the floor plan

general.story: The story (sometimes called 'floor' or 'level') an entity is on

doors-windows-openings.normalized_position_in_wall: Value in range: [0,1] where 0/1 refers to p1/p2 of parent wall centerline respectively. The xy-position of this entity can alternatively be found using the center_position and width.
doors-windows-openings.parent_wall_id: Unique identifier pointing to the wall which this entity is inside

walls.centerline: Centerline endpoints of the wall from p1 -> p2
walls.left_side: Side of the wall to the left of the centerline when traveling from p1 -> p2. This will be parallel to the centerline and half the thickness away from the centerline.
walls.right_side: Same as the left side, but to the right of the centerline when traveling from p1 -> p2.

objects.type: Types of objects include: air_conditioner, bathtub, bed, bidet, bookcase, carpet_rect, carpet_round, chair_dining_four_back_arms, chair_dining_four_back_no, chair_other_four_back_arms, chair_other_four_back_no, chair_stool_four_back_arms, chair_stool_four_back_no, chair_stool_four_no_no, chair_swivel_star_back_arms, chair_swivel_star_back_no, chair_swivel_star_no_no, dishwasher, electrical_panel, exit_sign, fire_alarm, fire_extinguisher, fireplace, gas_meter, heater, kitchen_island, light_ceiling, light_floor_lamp, light_wall, lightswitch_double, lightswitch_single, monitor, outlet_double, outlet_single, oven, plant_large, plant_small, radiator, refrigerator, shower, sink, smoke_detector, sofa_rect, sofa_rect_l_ex, sofa_single, stairs3, stairs7, stairs13, storage_cabinet_low1, storage_cabinet_low2, storage_cabinet_low4, storage_cabinet_mid1, storage_cabinet_mid2, storage_cabinet_mid3, storage_cabinet_mid4, storage_cabinet_mid5, storage_cabinet_tall2, storage_shelf, stove, table_coffee_elliptic, table_conference, table_dining_elliptic, table_dining_rect, table_other_rect, television, thermostat, toilet, urinal, vent_ceiling, vent_floor, vent_wall, wardrobe, washer_dryer, water_heater,
objects.angle_degrees_ccw: Rotation of object counter-clockwise where 0 degrees corresponds to the object facing forward along the x-axis
objects.corner_positions: 2D corners specifying the rectangle where the object is located

rooms.name: The room name can be manually edited in Polycam. Rooms are automatically classified into one of the following types: Kitchen, Laundry, Bathroom, Dining Room, Living Room, Closet, Hallway, Bedroom, Other,
rooms.vertices: Vertices trace out the counter-clockwise polygon boundary of the room. Multiple consecutive edges may be collinear, and the polygon can be concave or convex. This list of vertices is not closed (the first vertex doesn't equal the last vertex).
rooms.edges: This list will always be the same length as the list of vertices. Edge 0 includes vertices 0 and 1. Edge 1 includes vertices 1 and 2, and so on. If an edge is touching a wall, the wall_id and side (left or right) will be specified.

stories.story: Story (sometimes called 'floor' or 'level') number starting at 0
stories.story_label: User-input label for each story. If user does not input a label, the default is: First Floor, Second Floor, etc.
